data.message: Nothing can top your album cover for MMLP. The one with you on the ground. That picture tells so much. You were exposing yourself to the world

replies.message: that wasn't the MMLP album cover
It was man. It was. Maybe you are to young to know this but there were several different ones. This one is my all time favorite
I have a special edition mmlp that came with this cover
@Simon I think what Cody meant was that the picture I commented was not the actual album cover. Idk tho I could be wrong

I love mmlp, but it's too short. Think about it, 18 tracks, 4 of them are skits. So now 14, then only 10 of them were solo songs. Like I said I love the album, but listening to it in the car it seems like it's back on track one every 30 minutes
Imagine encore minus 5 tracks. Quality would increase while quantity descreases
But I did not post this picture because it is my favorite album. I POSTED THIS BECAUSE THIS IS MY FAVORITE COVER! Why can't anyone seem to understand that!?
I'm sad I don't have this one I have the standard MMLP cd
I don't know if MMLP is the best Em album or not. All I know is that the picture I showed in my original comment is MY FAVORITE ALBUM COVER!
How can it be the best when Slim Shady LP, Infinite, and Relapse were all better?
That's the original when they edited it as in censoring it Witch was stupid but they did him sitting on the porch of his childhood home that one was the most popular to
Yea Logan you are right. I was only 8! Now that I read your comment I recall all that. I think they censored the original because if you notice there are pills and alcohol on the floor
That is the original debut cover for MMLP. It's rare now.
